医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新肾功能方程的广泛采用可以减少心力衰竭护理中的种族差异阿拉巴马大学伯明翰分校 Marnix E. Heersink 医学院的医生科学家最近进行了一项大规模分析，以评估新引入的用于评估心力衰竭风险的方程的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Widespread-adoption-of-new-kidney-function-equation-could-reduce-racial-disparities-in-heart-failure-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Widespread-adoption-of-new-kidney-function-equation-could-reduce-racial-disparities-in-heart-failure-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74d1e90e-f0e2-46ce-b66c-cc0b6374c1a1 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 12:16:59 -0400 Widespread adoption of new kidney function equation could reduce racial disparities in heart failure care
科学家获得 680 万美元资助，研究环境化学物质如何增加 CVD 风险接触环境化学物质（包括常见塑料产品中的化学物质）与心血管疾病（CVD）风险增加有关，心血管疾病是全球死亡的主要原因。根据世界卫生组织的数据，2019 年有 1790 万人死于心血管疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Scientist-receives-2468M-grant-to-study-how-environmental-chemicals-increase-CVD-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Scientist-receives-2468M-grant-to-study-how-environmental-chemicals-increase-CVD-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef26c1ff-5309-4e3b-923d-5d88f60c7f72 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 11:57:28 -0400 Scientist receives $6.8M grant to study how environmental chemicals increase CVD risk
18 岁时进行高有氧运动可降低多种癌症的风险18 岁时有氧运动能力较高的男性在以后的生活中患多种癌症的风险较低，尤其是胃肠道癌症。哥德堡大学的一项研究表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/High-aerobic-fitness-at-age-18-linked-to-lower-risk-of-several-types-of-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/High-aerobic-fitness-at-age-18-linked-to-lower-risk-of-several-types-of-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ea73ec2-3257-4fc5-9cfe-a0f8ed46fb63 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 11:51:36 -0400 High aerobic fitness at age 18 linked to lower risk of several types of cancer
SIO 和 ASCO 建议基于正念的干预措施治疗癌症患者的焦虑、抑郁综合肿瘤学会 (SIO) 和美国临床肿瘤学会 (ASCO) 正式推荐基于正念的干预措施 (MBI) 和其他综合疗法来控制成人癌症患者的焦虑和抑郁症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/SIO-and-ASCO-recommend-mindativity-based-interventions-for-anxiety-depression-in-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/SIO-and-ASCO-recommend-mindativity-based-interventions-for-anxiety-depression-in-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=148d8e8b-25ac-4f99-8694-0e55de67572e Wed, 16 Aug 2023 09:52:09 -0400 SIO and ASCO recommend mindfulness-based interventions for anxiety, depression in cancer patients
下一代测序为自闭症和强直性肌营养不良症的潜在机制提供了新的见解自闭症与 1 型强直性肌营养不良症之间的病理机制联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Next- Generation-sequencing-provides-novel-insights-into-the-mechanisms-underlying-autism-and-myotonic-muscular-dystropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Next- Generation-sequencing-provides-novel-insights-into-the-mechanisms-underlying-autism-and-myotonic-muscular-dystropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e046ccfb-ae57-4aca-8b5d-0ae3a0703182 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 09:38:00 -0400 Next-generation sequencing provides novel insights into the mechanisms underlying autism and myotonic muscular dystrophy
电子烟与年轻人的支气管症状、呼吸短促有关《Thorax》在线发表的研究表明，年轻的电子烟使用者有出现支气管炎症状和呼吸短促的风险，即使他们或周围的其他人吸香烟或大麻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Vaping-linked-to-bronchitic-symptoms-shortness-of-breath-in-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Vaping-linked-to-bronchitic-symptoms-shortness-of-breath-in-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce8c31bf-f8e4-40aa-ad7f-6e5db57c96ba Wed, 16 Aug 2023 09:18:23 -0400 Vaping linked to bronchitic symptoms, shortness of breath in young people
研究发现膳食镁摄入量与外周动脉疾病呈负相关研究人员进行了一项横断面研究，以调查膳食镁摄入量与外周动脉疾病 (PAD) 之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Study-finds-inverse-correlation- Between-dietary-magnesium-intake-and-peripheral-arterial-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Study-finds-inverse-correlation- Between-dietary-magnesium-intake-and-peripheral-arterial-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=457931f8-e868-42eb-a5b6-16918be0bd7d Wed, 16 Aug 2023 09:10:00 -0400 Study finds inverse correlation between dietary magnesium intake and peripheral arterial disease
研究表明蚊子传播的病毒如何劫持宿主细胞以促进感染克利夫兰诊所的新研究表明，蚊子传播的病毒（如寨卡病毒、西尼罗河病毒、黄热病病毒和登革热病毒）如何劫持宿主细胞以促进自身复制和感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Research-shows-how-mosquito-transmissed-viruses-hijack-host-cells-to-promote-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Research-shows-how-mosquito-transmissed-viruses-hijack-host-cells-to-promote-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81b8a7f3-563a-4337-aa20-99a7fb725ad2 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 08:59:46 -0400 Research shows how mosquito-transmitted viruses hijack host cells to promote infection
危重病人的肠道微生物组及其通过免疫营养和益生菌的改变危重病人肠道菌群失调https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/The-gut-microbiome-of-riticly-ill-individuals-and-its-modification-by-immunonutrition-and-probiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/The-gut-microbiome-of-riticly-ill-individuals-and-its-modification-by-immunonutrition-and-probiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed2e3d61-3cb5-48ec-a5c9-74c568e60602 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 08:57:00 -0400 The gut microbiome of critically ill individuals and its modification by immunonutrition and probiotics
研究强调了中风高级护理和治疗的延迟芝加哥大学医学院的一项新研究表明，近 75% 的急性中风患者要等待两个多小时才能转移到综合性中风中心；延迟高级护理和治疗可能导致长期残疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Study-highlights-the-delay-in-advanced-中风-care-and-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Study-highlights-the-delay-in-advanced-中风-care-and-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb17c4db-13f9-46cf-91e2-b39147a03c66 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 08:46:39 -0400 Study highlights the delay in advanced stroke care and treatments
